channel.title: Is Windows update failing for everyone else too?
channel.description:
I've asked a few people and it seems to happen to them as well.
What about you? And what's the error code?

item.title: Is Windows update failing for everyone else too?
item.dc:creator: @The_Enforcer The Enforcer
item.description:
@The_Enforcer wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:546273”][quote author=The Enforcer link=topic=665172.msg4446749#msg4446749 date=1409235972]

your computer, like you, is to weak.

I and my PC both are superior beasts.

Can you even max settings dayz bro?

  • GTX 780Ti.

Anyway, this WU issue is a global problem with Windows 7 right now.
[/quote]
It is? I just went through and updated my Windows 7 completely. No issues or anything.[/quote]

They fixed it recently, you probably tried at that time.

This thread can be deleted.

Read full topic
item.source: Is Windows update failing for everyone else too?
